alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:24PM MDT until July 27 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 423 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Natural Fort, or 10 miles south of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Carr around 435 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rockport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
